items: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place a cable attachment at the lowest setting on a cable machine.
Grab the cable attachment with both hands and step back until there is tension on the cable.
Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, hinge at the hips and lower the cable attachment towards the ground.
Lower the cable attachment as far as you can while maintaining proper form and feeling a stretch in your hamstrings.
Slowly raise the cable attachment back up to the starting position, squeezing your glutes and hamstrings at the top of the movement.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.
Targets multiple muscle groups including back, shoulders, and arms
Improves upper body strength and endurance
Can be modified for different fitness levels and goals
